name: Secrets From the Past
description:
After de death of your grandmother, Cecilia, you recieve a series of instructions that she left for you as part of her inheritance.

They tell you that you must travel to Tebar, your grandmother´s old home, and solve the mystery that she left for you.

Secrets From the past is a game that tell us about the problem of depopulation that Spain suffers today.

(Nowadays, the game is just a demo in development and it is completely in Spanish)
